snippet: Palestinian officials on Monday began updating voter registration records in the Gaza Strip, a critical step toward ending the rift between the Fatah Party and the militant Hamas movement.
abstract: Palestinian officials begin updating voter registration records in Gaza Strip, critical step toward ending rift between Fatah Party, which governs in West Bank, and militant Hamas movement, which controls Gaza.
lead_paragraph: Palestinian officials on Monday began updating voter registration records in the Gaza Strip, a critical step toward ending the rift between the Fatah Party and the militant Hamas movement.

headline.seo: Gaza: Palestinians Begin Voter Registration Campaign
headline.main: Gaza: Palestinians Begin Voter Registration Campaign
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Palestinians Begin Voter Registration Campaign
